fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
When visited the visitor must roll 30 d6's
If more than 20 are either a 1, 2 or 3 nothing happens
The first visitor will become blessed by this role and cannot do any other action but attack.
Their attack level increases by a level and if their attack level was none beforehand they will be able to attack.
If this role dies, the blessed will go on a rampage, their wincon will change to a NK wincon regardless of their role.

fields.name: Wincon:
fields.value: Have Knight of Despair's blessed person survive till the end of the game.
